Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

OOC: Hehe thanks Yan, moderation is moderation, nothing I can do about it. =
 Now, can anybody tell me stuff I missed during my moderation time?  The on=
ly thing I can reply to that I saw was from Jer(late welcome back!)and abou=
t Symphony.

IC: Symphony was completely unconscious and almost dead.  Then=
, he saw light.  But he had no body.  His mind was just floating in a void,=
 but there was a light.  He liked it.  The light kept getting closer.  But =
then, he was stopped, then was being pulled backwards.

    "No!  No!  The =
light!  The light!!  Matrix, take me!" Symphony screamed in his mind.

    =
Then, he started hearing the voices of his two brothers.

    "Symphony, yo=
u're too soft!" yelled Orchestra's voice.

    "You have a lot to learn, wi=
mp!  Look what happens out there at war!  People are dieing due to your kin=
dness!" Composer yelled.

    Symphony now felt scared, then sad.  If he ha=
d his body, he would cry.  All his life, he had never been a help to anybod=
y.  His brother was right.  People were dieing, and he was doing nothing.  =
He was a wimp.  The Maximals didn't need him.  He'd be too wimpy for them. =
 If he could scream, he would, very loud, but not a scream of fear, or sadn=
ess, but of pure anger.  Then, he felt pain from somewhere, and then woke u=
p.

    He looked around a little bit.  His body was in better shape now.  =
He could stand!  He had arms back!  But he still felt pain, but not as much=
 as he had felt when he was ripped up before.  He was in a CR Chamber.  He =
could sense Decepticons here(no, not DBZ thing, just he could tell he was i=
n the Decepticon base and what not.)  Then, he thought about the void, and =
his brothers, and what they said.  Symphony burst out of the CR Chamber.  H=
e looked around, and then quickly saw Speedbreaker.  Symphony stared at him=
 for a moment.

     "Decepticon scum.....Wait, what am I talking about?  Y=
ou're not wimpy.  You Decepticons aren't wimpy, unlike me," Symphony said.
=

     A tear rolled down from his eye, and down his cheek.

     "See!  I'm=
 crying.  I'm so wimpy.  I CAN'T STAND IT ANYMORE!!!!!!!  Decepticon, pleas=
e, I beg of you, teach me not to be wimpy!" Symphony now went up to Speedbr=
eaker and was on his knees, and begging.

     "MAKE ME STRONG!  MAKE ME A =
KILLER!  MAKE ME STRONG!  MAKE ME A KILLER!  MAKE ME WAR-LIKE!!!!  I DON'T =
WANNA BE KIND!!  NOT GENTIL!  NOT SOFT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!=
!!!I'M A KILLER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" Symphony yelled louder than his vocal=
 unit probably would've allowed.

     Symphony begged the Decepticon to ma=
ke him....evil, just in different words.
